ygData.subject: Build matlab toolbox under Matlab R2006a
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all! The matlab toolbox of the last Cantera version works only with Matlab version R2006b. In my department the version of Matlab installed in Windows PCs

Subject: Build matlab toolbox under Matlab R2006a
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=182855029; y=J5Ds3iXVXai8JqWifaHuFmJEzJke2zoAU5kY0pjRLeQ1QI1Drg

Dear all!

The matlab toolbox of the last Cantera version works only with Matlab
version R2006b. 

In my department the version of Matlab installed in Windows PCs for
students is R2006a, and the toolbox is not work.

How can I compile the cantera toolbox compatible with this Matlab
version?

Do I need to build cantera from source? I'm trying to do with Visual
Studio 2005, but I obtain a compatibility error with python version?

Any suggestion?

Thank you for your attention 

Michele
